comments.creator: evnikita2@gmail.com
comments.author: evnikita2@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; ru; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729) WebMoney Advisor
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; ru; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729) WebMoney Advisor

RFC 5147 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5147) specified the URI Fragment Identifiers for the text/plain Media Type.  I've noticed that they are not handled at all by Firefox.  I don't know if it is a bug, but I think this is request for feature.

Reproducible: Always
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; ru; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729) WebMoney Advisor
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; ru; rv:1.9.2.16) Gecko/20110319 Firefox/3.6.16 ( .NET CLR 3.5.30729) WebMoney Advisor

RFC 5147 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5147) specified the URI Fragment Identifiers for the text/plain Media Type.  I've noticed that they are not handled at all by Firefox.  I don't know if it is a bug, but I think this is request for feature.

Reproducible: Always
